data.title: Good!
data.text: I came here for a late dinner on a Friday night. I was promptly seated at the bar and ordered a combination plate with chicken shawarma, kibbeh balls, hummus, and tabbouleh with grilled vegetable and clam chowder soup. The soup was bland. The grilled vegetables were decent. The kibbeh balls were decent. The chicken shawarma, hummus, pita, garlic spread and tabbouleh were all good, but nothing special. The server was really nice though! Overall, it was a nice meal, but I probably won't come back unless I am in the area again.

data.title: First time year, I have been missing out!!
data.text: I visit the Sterling Heights area a couple times a year for business, so I have my normal spots I go. I tried Tripadvisor this time because I felt like something new. The food here is really good, but you get a lot!! There is no way one person could eat one of their meals.. Also, the Bartender, I am sorry I don't remember her name, but it was her first day back from Medical leave. She was amazing, and makes great Martinis..

data.title: Love the food, hate the seating
data.text:
The last THREE TIMES I have been to Ike's they keep trying to sit us in an area with crying children who are running around and throwing stuff all over the floor. There were many sections that were open and while I understand you want to "contain" your customers, I don't want to have a night out with my girlfriends ordering drinks and talking while your kids are running around and screaming 

I will say, I have NEVER had a bad meal there.  Very good food and drinks. But hostess', USE YOUR HEAD when seating. Thank you.

data.title: The BEST Middle Eastern food
data.text: We love Ike's! The food is plentiful and delicious. No matter what you order on their large menu, you can't go wrong. All the favorite traditional dishes, along with some new originals. Friendly and accommodating wait staff. Super clean and well decorated. Also great for large parties and family gatherings. We always return to Ike's.

owner_response.author: Lisa R, Marketing at Ike's Restaurant, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you Nancy for sharing your experiences with us and for being a loyal guest.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent restaurant
data.text: Whether it's dine in, carry out or using their banquet faciltites, Ike's is quality. Ike is generally always there to meet and greet patrons, which shows he has a genuine vested interest in his customers.

data.title: Pretty good, but not the best in Michigan
data.text: Michigan seems to be the middle eastern food capital of the Midwest or maybe the usa. Lebanese cuisine is one of the major flavors in this category and Ike's is like a higher end Lebanese dinner. A lot of my co-workers would disagree with me, but I've been to Ike's many times and many other places rank higher for me every time. It's good. It isn't a waste of time and I'm sure you'll more than enjoy your meal, but there are better and not too far away either. Sorry Ike's! I still love you.

data.title: 50 Anniversary party
data.text: We were invited to a 50 anniversary party at Ike's restaurant.  The hummus was very delicious and the pita bread that they serve warm were delicious!  We were served a combo plate of grape leaves, chicken swarma, grilled lamb and side salad.  Everything was tender and delicious with great seasonings.  I would definitely return again to Ike's restaurant.

owner_response.author: Lisa R, Marketing at Ike's Restaurant, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are happy you have been able to experience Ike's Restaurant. Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. See you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Date Night
data.text: A little pricey but you get sooo much food!!  Staff friendly and helpful.  Clean and nice atmosphere Very good. Will go again

owner_response.author: Lisa R, Marketing at Ike's Restaurant, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for stopping in our your date night!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good Food
data.text: Ike's has a pretty good menu of Mediterranean foods.  You can get a little Greek or Lebanese, its all good at Ike's.  The touchscreen menus are pretty cool  too.

owner_response.author: Lisa R, Marketing at Ike's Restaurant, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for sharing your feedback. Yes, the touchscreens have been a hit, so we're glad you agree.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Wonderful Experience for a Birthday Party
data.text:
We have been to Ike's before and knew it was a good place but this Sunday - I reserved for my birthday for a group of 16.  It more than exceeded our expectations of other times we have been there.  We had a room to ourselves and it was set up with a table with linens for a cake and gifts.  Our servers were phenomenal. Very attentive.  And the best of all was that all our food came out warm and at the same time.  Almost unheard of for large parties. Would definitely recommend this to anyone considering a larger party. 

The food - no matter what was ordered - was good as usual.

owner_response.author: Lisa R, Marketing at Ike's Restaurant, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hi Denise - we are thrilled you chose us to celebrate your birthday! We strive to make every celebration and gathering a huge success! We hope you had a fabulous birthday. :)
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Birthday Celebration
data.text:
Great service, great food, large portions at a reasonable price.

I took a big gang from the office for lunch and zero complaints.
Great job Ike and hats off to your staff!

owner_response.author: Lisa R, Marketing at Ike's Restaurant, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Wonderful Tommy! Thank you for letting us know your office staff enjoyed your recommendation. See you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Ambience and good food at a fair price
data.text: Ike's has been around for years, always delivering good food, service, at a fair price. Thumbs up to management for maintaining the inside and outside to high standards

owner_response.author: Lisa R, Marketing at Ike's Restaurant, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We strive to make Ike's the best place possible for our staff and guests.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: One of my favorite restaurants
data.text: I've eaten at Ike's a lot and have never been disappointed.  The staff is friendly and efficient and the food is wonderful.  On Thursday evenings there is a jazz entertainer who is enjoyable to listen to. The food is well prepared and I love the fresh "puffy" bread with the garlic spread.  I have not seen a lot of children there but there is a menu for them.   The portions are very large and could easily feed two people.

owner_response.author: Lisa R, Marketing at Ike's Restaurant, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your business and sharing your feedback with us. Pleze our Jazz entertainer on Thursday nights is wonderful. We are glad you think so too!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Kibbee
data.text: Came to get a carryout. Service was fantastic. We were greeted as soon as we got in the door, got our order and was on out way within 10 minutes! We ordered some kibbee nyee and tabouli salad. Their kibbee is soooo good! We order it mild to spicy and it's perfect!

owner_response.author: Lisa R, Marketing at Ike's Restaurant, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for choosing Ike's. We appreciate your feedback. See you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great food, reasonable price
data.text: Nice staff, love the chicken schwarma sandwich! I have not really seen many children in the restaurant when I have been there, so not sure they have a kids menu?

owner_response.author: Lisa R, Marketing at Ike's Restaurant, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Yes, we offer a children's menu. 

For our guests under 10 Includes small soft drink or milk
Chicken strips and french fries 
Fish and Chips 
Cheeseburger and french fries 
Grilled Chicken, Mashed Potato & Vegetables 
Cheese Pizza
Spaghetti
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: just ok
data.text: They have greek american and two other types of food.  The parking lot is always full and it seems to have brisk business.

owner_response.author: Lisa R, Marketing at Ike's Restaurant, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your feedback. We have always taken pride in serving authentic and traditional Lebanese dishes as well as American, Greek, and Italian.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Delicious garlic dip
data.text: We have been here a few times and lived it every time.  They have a great garlic dip and the menu fits for everyone.  I think there is a vegetarian menu as well.

data.title: Great Food
data.text: Their food is excellent. Nice atmosphere. However, unless you order a la carte or leave out some items, the meal is too large for one person. Most come with both soup and salad. It would be great to be able to pick one or the other and reduce the price accordingly. Our soups are never eaten and that's such a waste.

owner_response.author: Lisa R, Marketing at Ike's Restaurant, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We pride ourselves on large portions so that you can take some home with you and enjoy the next day too!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Always Wonderful!
data.text: Today we three friends enjoyed lunch at Ike's.  Can't say enough wonderful compliments about the service from walking in the front door to being seated and getting wonderful service. It was lunch time and they were busy, but Cecelia was such an efficient waitress and very patient and helpful.  The food was wonderful.  It was such an enjoyable lunch and they didn't hurry us out.  We lingered over refills of ice tea.  So nice!

owner_response.author: Lisa R, Marketing at Ike's Restaurant, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for choosing to visit us at lunch. Cecelia is a wonderful addition to our staff. See you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good food, but bring earplugs!
data.text: Four of us for dinner at Ike's.  Food was quite good, portions nothing short of outrageous.  Service was very good, too.  Our only complaint was the horde of screaming children whose parents apparently thought those little terrorists were "cute."  We didn't.

owner_response.author: Lisa R, Marketing at Ike's Restaurant, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are thrilled you choose to join us for dinner. See you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response
